meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>sink</kanji> and <kanji>die</kanji> it's because you were <vocabulary>sinking</vocabulary> in the ocean or a pool or something. It's important to notice you're <vocabulary>going down</vocabulary> so you don't die like that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
